properties.headline: Flood Warning issued March 1 at 7:37PM CST by NWS Mobile AL
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the following rivers in Alabama...

Tombigbee River Near Coffeeville Dam affecting Choctaw...Clarke and Washington
Counties.
Tombigbee River Near Leroy affecting Choctaw...Clarke and Washington Counties.
...The flood warning continues for the following rivers in Alabama...

Bayou Sara At Saraland affecting Mobile County.
Mobile River At Barry Steam Plant affecting Baldwin and Mobile Counties.

.Recent heavy rains have caused significant rises along the river.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Bayou Sara At Saraland
* until further notice.
* At 4 PM Sunday the stage was 7.0 feet.
* Moderate flooding is occurring and Moderate flooding is forecast.
* Flood stage is 4.0 feet.
* The river will continue to fall to a stage of 4.8 feet by early Friday afternoon.
* At 7.5 feet...Numerous houses flood at 7.5 feet and some evacuations also
become necessary. Above 8 feet numerous streets and houses flood east of the
railroad between Bayou Sara and Norton Creeks.
properties.instruction:
SAFETY MESSAGE...
Stay tuned to developments by listening to NOAA Weather radio.
